评论详情: Very easy to adjust the fit to your size.

评论概述: Cute but only comfy in shorter spans
评论详情: The clasps are so frustrating, and somewhay uncomfortable at the back of the neck, but the elasticity is good, it is definitely just bra straps so it has the limitations you'd expect from that. But damn, it looks cute, especially layered over something else with split strap sleeves. I was worried it wouldn't fit me at all since I wear plus sizes, but it manages okay since I could adjust it.

This harness is soooo wonderful! It’s very adjustable and stretchy to fit different body types. It looks nice, is pretty simple to figure out, and a great price comparatively.  BUT the top neck strap can’t be loosened very much, and the bottom neck strap flips up often and can be annoying.  Overall I’d recommend it! Oh, and my bf recommends it too!
A nice starter harness if you're not ready for a leather one yet. Looks great on. The choker part did make my neck itch but it was minor.

评论概述: The bottoms are an absolute puzzle
评论详情: I LOVE this set once I get it on. The top I wear with more regularity. It takes serious commitment and puzzle skills to figure out how to put the bottoms on but I love them when I have the energy to get it right. We've even tried marking them with ribbons for reminders of what goes where and it's STILL so challenging to sort out.

it's a little too small for me but i don't consider that a fault of the product, just a fact of life. it's nicely stretchy and adjustable, pretty easy to figure out how to put it on.  my only complaint really is that the two parts that latch around the neck don't like to behave and kinda bunch together? i don't know if this is a problem with my body specifically or the product. i'm inclined to believe the former.
I wear a 40 F. This was struggling to go all the way down from my neck to my under bust. It just looked, and felt uncomfortable.

评论概述: This is not what I ordered
评论详情: What I ordered and what I received do not match. I ordered a black one previously and love it so I ordered one in green. It is very much not what I ordered and NOTHING like the black one. It’s also waaaaaayyyy lower quality.
I dislike that the height isnt adjustable The neck part doesn't stay at my neck and the metal rings open up easily. Idk I don't really like it.
Looks very nice on.. worn alone.

评论概述: Fits great and a confidence booster!
评论详情: Fits really nicely on me! I'd say the topmost part of the choker portion of the harness is a little too high up for my own tastes but the whole thing is easily adjustable and sits really nicely on my body. I'm about 5'3 and 125 lbs for reference. I can't wait to wear this! Made me feel really nice about myself. I'm even tempted to look into other styles too!

评论概述: Strappy and Sassy! Fits these 44 DDDs like a glove!
评论详情: I did feel that my boobs were in bandage, but this piece was so sexy my drinks were free that night!! I would say a win win!! Pair over a shirt or under for a strappy surprise.  I can't wait to get in another color!!! Definitely getting all of the colors!
I got it for the craft project to fit on the mannequin. Looks as I wanted it to.
She loved it.. and it had adjustable straps.

Love, love, love this! The material is a little rough around the neck where the pieces come together around the little metal rings but it doesn't bother me too much. Very sexy over anything and especially without!
Good size, easy to be adjested to your size, comfortable
